Title: The Haunted World of El Superbeasto
Genre: Animation, Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Horror, Musical
Writer: Mike Bell (additional story), Joe Ekers (additional story), Tom Klein (additional story), Mr. Lawrence (additional screenplay material), Joe Orrantia (additional story), Tom Papa, Carey Yost (additional story), Rob Zombie (story)
Actors: Joe Alaskey, Ken Foree, Sheri Moon Zombie, Tom Papa
Plot: The story follows the adventures of El Superbeasto, a washed-up Mexican luchador, and his sultry sidekick and sister Suzi-X as they confront an evil villain by the name of Dr. Satan. The adventure, set in the mythic world of Monsterland, also has a character named Murray the robot.
